data.what_is:
AppsChopper is an app development service provider with offices in New York, Boston, and Walpole. We have served clients with innovative application design and development since 2011. 

Our team of strong developers, UI/UX specialists, QA experts, and project coordinators has helped clients from diverse industries develop apps with rich functionality. From exciting startups to reputable enterprises, we've collaborated with hundreds of businesses to deliver world-class, engaging native, hybrid, and cross-platform apps. Our services include the following.

Comprehensive Custom Apps - We build, test, and deploy innovative, tailor-made solutions using blockchain, AI, AR/VR, and IoT technologies.

Quality Assurance - We design and implement testing strategies that combine manual and automated testing techniques for your app.

Now that you know about us, simply visit our website and get in touch with us for a quick consultation at a time of your convenience.
data.product_description: Appschopper, a Webby Central LLC Company, is a creative app design & development agency serving clients worlwide since 2011.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Deliver Quality Mobile Applications for Startups, Midmarket and Enterprise.
Develop Scalable and Visually Appealing Android Applications for Smartphones, Tablets, Wearables, and Android TV
plan_features: Highly Usable Apps For Android 14 as well as older versions

pricing_plans.plan_description: iOS Mobile App Development For iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, and Apple Watch

initial_reviews.review_title: They Are Making Excellent Progress In Our Project. Keep It Up!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AppsChopper?
We appreciate their commitment to understanding every little detail of our requirements. In fact, their team has not only made sure we are getting what we want, but they have also offered excellent suggestions wherever they felt the app might benefit more from it.

What do you dislike about AppsChopper?
There has been nothing for us to dislike so far.

Recommendations to others considering AppsChopper:
Don't hesitate to share your requirements in great detail, they absorb all of it like a sponge and make sure everything is implemented as expected. They will also offer suggestions that will improve the overall experience of the project.

What problems is AppsChopper solving and how is that benefiting you?
AppsChopper is helping us bridge the gap between our teachers, students and their parents by building an app to ensure regular communication regarding school calendars and schedules. They have suggested some excellent features that would help our teachers support the education of our students in the best manner possible.

What do you like best about AppsChopper?
We're impressed with their customer service and solutions-based approach to the development of the app. The best thing about their team is that they are transparent with their client.

The AppsChopper team is passionate, creative, and informed in the work they're doing. Really appreciable.

What do you dislike about AppsChopper?
There is no such improvement in them. They worked perfectly on every aspect.

Recommendations to others considering AppsChopper:
If you are looking for any mobile app consulting partner, AppsChopper is the best team that you can connect with.

What problems is AppsChopper solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our goal was to create the best-in-class, on-demand delivery app that would make the user's life convenient. We had no app capabilities and so we set about finding an agency that would guide us to launch our app. AppsChopper team was very excellent, they're organizing our thoughts and helping us see the big picture.

They provide us with app consulting services and explained everything essential from idea to launch in app development. All these essential things were implemented in the app that has made our app outstanding.

initial_reviews.review_title: The AppsChopper team truly makes it feel like we are all a part of one team.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AppsChopper?
Their transparency, the way of communicating with clients, the technology they use and on-time support makes their team unique, and I was literally impressed by the work I got from them.

What do you dislike about AppsChopper?
No, there is no such improvement as of now. They are doing fantastic work.

Recommendations to others considering AppsChopper:
Their team is highly supportive and are helping hand. I would highly recommend them.

What problems is AppsChopper solving and how is that benefiting you?
I wanted to develop an event organizer app to serve local live events across the US. I searched for multiple app development companies online.

Most of the companies had not worked on the app type, which was my requirement.

Lastly, I found AppsChopper. When I talked to them, their business analyst team explained each and every thing brilliantly.

Finally, I decided to go with them. The main reason for selecting them was, they explained to me how they are going to process my project, what programming languages they are going to use, what are the add-on features they are going to implement. All these explanations made me go with them.

initial_reviews.review_title: Upgraded the Alma app and integrated the advanced features for a better user experience.
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AppsChopper helped with:
I hired AppsChopper to update the Alma health app and add more interactive features, like an activity dashboard, reporting /analytics, etc.

What do you like best about AppsChopper?
One of my friends referred AppsChopper to me, and after that, I read the company's review. I found AppsChopper's portfolio quite inspiring and decided to hire the company.

Afterward, I read previous client feedback, which was positive. I even sent my query to the company's project manager- Ms. Niah Wilson, who patiently listened to my overall project requirements.

What do you dislike about AppsChopper?
Nothing. The entire team of AppsChopper is proficient in their skill set.

Recommendations to others considering AppsChopper:
I hired AppsChopper app development company to update the Alma health app and asked the team to integrate the app with the latest features.

The development team of AppsChopper also shared the MVP strategy with me since I wanted to validate the app features I planned to integrate. As a result, I received feedback from my targeted audience, with the help of which I optimized the features accordingly.

What problems is AppsChopper solving and how is that benefiting you?
I hired AppsChopper to update the Alma health app and add more interactive features, like an activity dashboard, reporting /analytics, etc.

initial_reviews.review_title: Revamp the Aliment app and integrate the latest features for a smooth user experience.

AppsChopper understood my expectations, and so far, I have received the exact app design along with the necessary features that I wanted. I am hoping to get my app within the given timeline.

What do you dislike about AppsChopper?

What problems is AppsChopper solving and how is that benefiting you?

initial_reviews.review_title: AppsChopper delivered a secure, scalable, and highly-interactive app.
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AppsChopper helped with:
We hired AppsChopper to build a military vacation planner app from scratch with engaging and high-performing UI/UX.

The MVP app lets military members search for fascinating travel destinations based on their real-time location or upcoming itineraries.

What do you like best about AppsChopper?
Their in-depth knowledge regarding the technology and how they meet our requirements was truly impressive. The best thing about the AppsChopper development team is they patiently listened to our business requirements and dedicatedly worked on them.

What do you dislike about AppsChopper?
I am happy with their service, and the least they could do for betterment is make room for more unique ideas.

What problems is AppsChopper solving and how is that benefiting you?
The team offered quality services and designed the app just like we wanted.

Military vacation planner is already running in the Apple App Store, and soon the updated version will be launched along with the Google Play Store.

Describe the project or task AppsChopper helped with:
I was looking for a media app that allows users to read regional and national news in Albanian Language. Users can easily access the app to read the stories and can discover what's happening around. Apart from news publishing, the app also offers various services to people who are living in Albania.

What do you like best about AppsChopper?
The best thing about AppsChopper is their planning and coordination. Their top level management understands the value of each and every client they have. I was so happy when at a point their Directors came into action when the team got trapped in a problem. I saw how beautifully the directors sorted out the problem and helped the team to deliver the project before the delivery date. There was lots of pressure through the project but these people always dealt it with ease. I appreciate their efforts.

What do you dislike about AppsChopper?
In general I faced some communication issue at first. I was not able to make them understand what exactly I was looking for but within 2-3 seatings everything was sorted. Thanks to their management team who helped me in improving my idea as well as adding more valuable points to the discussion which I had missed. These people are so good at their work and they take utmost care of their clients, how can anyone dislike them. :)

Recommendations to others considering AppsChopper:
If you are looking for a web and mobile app development company on whom you can trust fully, then it should be AppsChopper. They neither make fake promises nor they compromise with quality.
They Charge you according to industry standards. They don't beleive in giving heavy discounts and delivering low standard work. They are always straight and clear when it comes to their charges and quality. No hidden cost or any cheating, everything is kept transparent which you can easily access.

What problems is AppsChopper solving and how is that benefiting you?
With the development of our own mobile app. Now, we are able to serve people with latest news updates and current affairs at one place. People are able to use it with ease as we have kept everything under one roof. Thanks to the team of AppsChopper because of their hard work and due to the outstanding knowledge base of their designers as well as developers, we were able to publish such a useful application.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best Mobile App Company I came Across in New York !!
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AppsChopper helped with:
I wanted to develop an application will be providing energy efficient solution for room heating and helps user save lots of money. Using BTU Calculator app user can maintain record of the required BTU calculations, which can be accessed for future use. The app is featured with a powerful BTU calculating algorithm and gives user accurate metrics based on several heating factors. The app is designed to offer BTU unit calculation in either imperial or metrics, whichever suit user most.

What do you like best about AppsChopper?
Their ideas around the project, execution, strategy which was very well planned by them. They always worked with full dedication, everytime I needed any change in the designs or app screens they never hesitated in implementing it if I seemed right. The best thing about AppsChopper is they never suggest you any wrong ideas or blindly followed whatever I said. They always cross questioned me on the scope of the work. If it seemed right for the project then they used to implement it.

What do you dislike about AppsChopper?
Nothing as such. Their team is good, they know how to work with deadlines on head, they very professionally handled the pressure we had during the project. There were few problems in communication during the whole project but small errors happens during big projects, so it can be ignored.

Recommendations to others considering AppsChopper:
AppsChopper is a brilliant company dealing with web and mobile apps. we didn't expect that  level of dedication AppsChopper showed us during the development period. We are happy that we worked with them. I would highly recommend to anyone who is looking for mobile apps and expects quality work.

What problems is AppsChopper solving and how is that benefiting you?
With the BTU calculator users are able to calculate the exact heating unit they need for heating a room and with this they are able to save the extra money they used to spend earlier.

Describe the project or task AppsChopper helped with:
We hired AppsChopper to develop a mobile app for our healthcare and fitness business. It was basically a photo app that can quickly check and compare gains and losses of muscle or fat from one time period to another with focus on every major muscle group. The app allows users to send and share their progress on any of the social media sites they own.

What do you like best about AppsChopper?
The best part is these people always think out of the box, everytime they came up with new ideas to implement. They got really good developers and designers who can turn every impossible to possible. They are not from those who just say "Yes Sir, It will be done as you say". Whenever they think I was going wrong somewhere they corrected me and came up with better ideas and suggestions which always impressed me.

What do you dislike about AppsChopper?
I had a really great experience with AppsChopper and I don't think there was any thing which can be disliked about them.

Recommendations to others considering AppsChopper:
These people are dedicated, reliable and  professional in their work. I would highly recommend AppsChopper to anyone who is looking for a Mobile app.

What problems is AppsChopper solving and how is that benefiting you?
After the App went live. I shared them with some of the nearby Gyms and fitness centre owners who are my friends. They liked the idea and its concept. They promoted the app in their place and people started downloading the app. I got good response from everyone who used it. There were many suggestions which also came up from the user side. We tried to work on it as well as implement them ASAP.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best People to Work With For App Development
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AppsChopper helped with:
My app, iStudy, is an students tracking solution, a step forward for parents to keep track of their children in a smart way.

I hired AppsChopper for design and development of the app. Their team was patient in noting down all my points which I have already planned. We easily framed the whole scenario in a detailed documentation. We had lots of calls during the planning phase, these people were always ready with their question and recommendations which I liked much. They were always open to discussions, and even the change requests in the application.

What do you like best about AppsChopper?
Their team is hard working, technologically strong and fast in execution. The best thing that i liked is they always welcomed my changes and made the app that i was looking for.



What do you dislike about AppsChopper?
Nothing in general. One thing which use to bother me was the time-zone difference, since they were based in New York and I was in Tripoli. But still they managed the communication pretty well.

Recommendations to others considering AppsChopper:
They got the best hands for app development. Go for them without a second thought.

initial_reviews.review_title: Food Ordering Application for My Business
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AppsChopper helped with:
We hired a team from AppsChopper for designing and developing a food ordering application for our  business. The main goal behind this project was to help people avoid rush and get their favorite food delivered at their doorstep easily with a simple and hassle-free process.

What do you like best about AppsChopper?
These people are dedicated, detailed and patient in their work there's no doubt in that. But what impressed us was, there were some immediate changes which we wanted to make before launching the app. These people took that pain and invested their weekend and delivered what they promised; "Quality work with 100% client satisfaction"

What do you dislike about AppsChopper?
We are too much happy with their work. So we don't think there's anything to dislike about AppsChopper

Recommendations to others considering AppsChopper:
I highly recommend AppsChopper to all the people who are looking for developing mobile app for thier business.

What problems is AppsChopper solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our app after release got decent downloads and people liked the concept and are happily using the app for ordering food online.

initial_reviews.review_title: Pool of Good and Talented People!!
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task AppsChopper helped with:
I was looking for an app for our military personals to feel special and build and app specially for them to avail added benefits. An app where military members can browse and find hotels, restaurants, etc. across US that offer special discounts and best deals exclusively for military personals. After we hired AppsChopper, They understood my thought process easily and suggested to go with Cross platform development as we were bit low on budget. They developed the app within shared time period. The app was developed with features like strict validation on login for military personals only, browse hotels, hotel details, categories, location, sort, filter, deals, hotel booking, notifications etc.

What do you like best about AppsChopper?
Their module of work was great. They have good knowledge of technology, as well as they works with owner's mentality so I can say that overall workflow was impressive.

What do you dislike about AppsChopper?
I didn't find any reason to dislike them. They are a team of dynamic people who work with owner's mentality.

Recommendations to others considering AppsChopper:
I would Highly recommend AppsChopper to everyone !!
